text: Niscaya capha arau mararaa allahara nidarsanasamuhara antarbhukta. Eteke yiye (kaba) gharara hajja athaba omaraaha sampanna karae, e'i dutara majata cha'i karaile tara kono aparaadha nahaâ€™ba; arau yiye sbatahsphurtabharae kono sat kama karaiba, tente niscaya allaha uttama puraskaradata, sarbajna
